column1: English Sent: You have already learnt earlier that India is a vast country with varied landforms.
Hindi Tansl: jEsA ki Apa jAnawe hEM ki BArawa viBinna sWalAkqwiyoM vAlA eka viSAla xeSa hE.
Anu Translation:  Apa pahale pahale se hI jAna cuke hEM ki BArawa Binna lEndPoVrmjZa se eka viSAla xeSa hE
